item.description:
This meetup is the raindate for the October 4th date. I woke this morning and checked out the weather forecast. Apparently, Wednesday evening will be host to rain, thunder and lightning-not good ingredients for a meetup, I think.

I was thinking that we could talk about fanblogs and the 'bloggerazzi.'

And of course, my original idea, which is to get to know each other and inform each other about our current blogging experience.

As always, this meetup is open to all levels.

Like last time, I'll grab some space beside the large screen or near the door and I will have a sign on the table.

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Weblogger October Meetup
